          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16976693">
          <p>
          </p>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16976698">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16976698">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16976698">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate scholarly film criticism?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16976698">
          <div id="boxatt16976698" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20020270">
              <a id="link_20020270" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://0-web.ebscohost.com.library.muhlenberg.edu/ehost/search/advanced?sid=76f9f3e2-2b11-4085-bfb6-5ebb13cafe64%40sessionmgr110&amp;vid=1&amp;hid=127" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20020270,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film History I: 1895-1945 ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20020270}); ">
               Communication &amp; Mass Media Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Scholarly film criticism. 1980s-present. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25598541">
              <a id="link_25598541" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=f3h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25598541,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film History I: 1895-1945 ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23458843}); ">
               Film &amp; Television Literature Index with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals, trade journals, books, and more in the areas of television and film. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Get It links to check for full text online or in the library. Full text includes Cinema Journal, Film &amp; History, Film Comment, Film Criticism, Film History, Film International, Film Journal International, Journal of Film and Video, and Journal of Popular Film and Television.
               <br />
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20020303">
              <a id="link_20020303" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20020303,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film History I: 1895-1945 ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25598510">
              <a id="link_25598510" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25598510,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film History I: 1895-1945 ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12766286}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier scholarly index, with numerous links to full text, to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25598540">
              <a id="link_25598540" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25598540,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film History I: 1895-1945 ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12766128}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A substantive archive of approximately 15 scholarly film studies journals, all full text. In most cases, the last 3-5 years are not included in the archive. Full text journals include Cinema Journal, Film History, Film Quarterly, and Journal of Film and Video,
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox22128335">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22128335">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22128335">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate scholarly socio-cultural, aesthetic, and technological context?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22128335">
          <div id="boxatt22128335" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25598518">
              <a id="link_25598518" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25598518,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film History I: 1895-1945 ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The definitive database of literature covering the history and culture of the United States and Canada, from prehistory to the present. With selective indexing for 1,700 journals from 1964 to present, this database is without question the most important bibliographic reference tool for students and scholars of U.S. and Canadian history. Full text journals include American Historical Review, American 19th Century History, American Studies, Early American Studies, Journal of American Culture, Journal of American History, Journal of Early American History, and Journal of Military History.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25598514">
              <a id="link_25598514" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25598514,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film History I: 1895-1945 ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25598539">
              <a id="link_25598539" href="http://books.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25598539,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film History I: 1895-1945 ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24880846}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To peak inside books before requesting on interlibrary loan.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25598519">
              <a id="link_25598519" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25598519,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film History I: 1895-1945 ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing, abstracts, and selected full text of articles appearing in history journals, with emphasis on world history from 1450 to present (excluding the U.S. and Canada which are covered in America: History and Life). It includes citations to books, journal articles, and dissertations.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16976697">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16976697">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16976697">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate partisan reviews?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16976697">
          <div id="boxatt16976697" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20020197">
              <a id="link_20020197" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20020197,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film History I: 1895-1945 ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Popular reviews and some film criticism. 1980s-present. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20020202">
              Film review index
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Humanities Ref. 016.79143 F487r
               <br />
               Includes reviews of films made from 1882-1985.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20020242">
              <a id="link_20020242" href="http://imdb.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20020242,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film History I: 1895-1945 ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20020242}); ">
               Internet Movie Database
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A good place for filmography and maybe some reviews.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20020247">
              <a id="link_20020247" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20020247,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Film History I: 1895-1945 ', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12369807}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Good source for current reviews. 1980s-present. May include filmographies.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4616902" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16976701">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16976701">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16976701">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16976701">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            Trexler Library's
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16976701" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16976702">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16976702">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16976702">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16976702">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16976702" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
